name: Caferesso
0:
”Alexa, open moka pot”
”Alexa, launch moka pot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: moka pot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You need at least one Caferesso Smart Moka Pot Coffee Maker to use this intend. 
Before you start, make sure that you have logged in to the app from your phone and activated login with Amazon to match your username with the device.

With this intend;

You can tell Alexa to “start” and “stop” the Caferesso Moka Pot coffee maker.
You can tell Alexa to “set keep warm time to 30 minutes” so that your coffee will be kept warm for another 30 minutes after its ready. 
You can even say “set temperature to 70 degrees” to control its warmness level.
